Article.ArticleTitle: Editorial: Covid, Long Covid, Mental Health, Schools and Masks: how and why we failed child health communication during a pandemic.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: Author DB received funding from Pfizer and Roche to study long covid in children. The remaining authors declare that the research was conducted in the absence of any commercial or financial relationships that could be construed as a potential conflict of interest.
